# sum()

**Instance Method**

Returns the sum of the column slice’s elements, ignoring missing elements.

## Declaration

```swift
func sum() -> WrappedElement
```

## Getting Statistical Values

- **min()**: Returns the element with the lowest value, ignoring missing elements.
- **max()**: Returns the element with the highest value, ignoring missing elements.
- **mean()**: Returns the mean average of the floating-point slice’s elements, ignoring missing elements.
- **mean()**: Returns the mean average of the integer slice’s elements, ignoring missing elements.
- **standardDeviation(deltaDegreesOfFreedom:)**: Returns the standard deviation of the integer column slice’s elements, ignoring missing elements.
- **standardDeviation(deltaDegreesOfFreedom:)**: Returns the standard deviation of the floating-point column slice’s elements, ignoring missing elements.
